name: Gemmy and the Hunt for the Coin
name_original: Gemmy and the Hunt for the Coin
description:
Made for the 2022 GamesPlusJam. #GPJam

Gemmy is the Hero.

That is what everyone would say, right? Gemmy would be the protagonist of this story, wouldn't he? A happy little green gem running around saving the day.

What if the roles were all mixed up?

What if there was no hero?

What if Gemmy was the villain?

What if a coin was the protagonist?

Well, you've got to play the game to find out if Gemmy is truly a hero or just a greedy gem.

Credits

WebGL Template - https://github.com/seleb/Better-Minimal-WebGL-Template

Sound Effects Generation - https://github.com/ttencate/jfxr

Music Creation - https://onlinesequencer.net/
